title: Rez Infinite
notes:
Game has a launcher menu where you choose Stage 1-5 or Stage X, this loader doesn't work and results in a black window with a corrupt cursor.
Closing this window starts the 'Rez HD' portion (Stages 1 through 5) which otherwise works fine without incident.

Stage X is impossible to start without the launcher.

title: Rez Infinite
notes: Requires "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" to work. The main game is completely playable, the Area X mode crashes. VR was not tested.

title: Rez Infinite
notes: I confirm the command line "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" do the trick. The Zone X is still unplayable though.
Game works with the PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% parameter added. Performance is so bad, making the game a bit unplayable (graphic lag and sound issues)
title: Rez Infinite
